admin-egoi.navigation.label: E-goi
admin/egoi-admin.syncFieldsText: Choose the fields from your contact list in E-goi that will receive the contacts created in Vtex.
admin/egoi-admin.syncDefaultFieldsText: The Name, Surname, Email, Mobile and Date of Birth fields are already mapped for default entities like CL or CO.
admin/egoi-admin.syncDefaultFieldsText2: For new entities, you must map these fields manually, and the email or mobile phone field must always be present.
admin/egoi-admin.syncDefaultFieldsText3: You should also pay attention to the data type when mapping new fields.
admin/egoi-admin.mappingDescription: In this section you can map the statuses of your store's orders with the statuses recognized by E-goi.
admin/egoi-admin.syncDescription: In this section you can carry out the full order synchronization process. This process will be carried out in the background.
admin/egoi-admin.csText1: Connected Sites is an E-goi content manager feature, connected to your Vtex Store, perfect for remarketing actions like returning users, abandoned cart, forms and much more!
admin/egoi-admin.csText2: Activate this option here, and confirm if Connected Sites is also active in E-goi Platform (Account Settings -> Connected Sites).
admin/egoi-admin.csText3: To know more about the feature Connected Sites, check
admin/egoi-admin.csErrorStore: Error saving settings! There are no Store configuration!
admin/egoi-admin.abandonedCartLabel: To activate the Abandoned Cart feature, you need to inject this script in your store's checkout javascript file.
admin/egoi-admin.saveRequiredFieldsError: Error: Fill in the missing fields.
admin/egoi-admin.asText1: For advanced settings, click on the button and log in to Goidini with your E-goi account details.
admin/egoi-admin.asText2: After logging in, you will have access to the advanced settings of your VTEX integration where you can:
admin/egoi-admin.asFeat3: Configure SMS sending by order status
admin/egoi-admin.asFeat4: Configure the sending of Boleto recovery SMS
admin/egoi-admin.apiKeyText: To activate the integration you need to choose the list where you want to sync and save the data.
admin/egoi-admin.legacy1: Attention! If you have activated the
admin/egoi-admin.legacy3: with vtex, this integration will replace the existing one.
admin/egoi-admin.configNeed: Need to configure integration in Account tab!
